pkgmetadata.longdescription: NailGun=======.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/SatelliteQE/nailgun/badge.svg :target: https://coveralls.io/r/SatelliteQE/nailgun.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/SatelliteQE/nailgun.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/SatelliteQE/nailgun.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/nailgun/badge/?version=latest :target: https://nailgun.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation StatusNailGun is a GPL-licensed Python library that facilitates easy usage of theSatellite 6 API.The `full documentation <http://nailgun.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_ isavailable on ReadTheDocs. It can also be generated locally:: pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt make docs-html
